bibl.title: New Evidence about the Fall of Patriarch Macedonius of Constantinople (511 CE) from a Coptic Ostrakon.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The text [a Coptic version of a letter of Severus, the patriarch of Antioch, to Soterichus, bishop of Cappadocia]. - Historical context and interpretation. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Journal of the Canadian Society for Coptic Studies / Journal de la société canadienne pour les études coptes

bibl.seg: Dijkstra Jitse, New Evidence about the Fall of Patriarch Macedonius of Constantinople (511 CE) from a Coptic Ostrakon.
Journal of the Canadian Society for Coptic Studies / Journal de la société canadienne pour les études coptes 2 (2011) pp. 43-50.
Introduction. - The text [a Coptic version of a letter of Severus, the patriarch of Antioch, to Soterichus, bishop of Cappadocia]. - Historical context and interpretation. - Conclusion.
